original_text: But he rebelled against him by sending his ambassadors to Egypt, that they might give him horses and a large army. Will he thrive? Can one escape who does such things? Can he break the covenant and yet escape?
korean_text: 그가 사절을 애굽에 보내 말과 군대를 구함으로 바벨론 왕을 배반하였으니 형통하겠느냐 이런 일을 행한 자가 피하겠느냐 언약을 배반하고야 피하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: by sending his ambassadors to Egypt
that they might give him horses
Can one escape who does such things?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 일을 하는 자가 피할 수 있겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: Can he break the covenant and yet escape?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 언약을 깨뜨리고도 피할 수 있겠느냐?
